setRole(int).Description: Supply the role only to distinguish tax and shipping from regular items. Valid values are defined in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#LineItem#Role_E@. Defaults to @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#LineItem#Role#REGULAR_E@, indicating a regular item. Only one @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#LineItem#Role#TAX_E@ entry is permitted.

setDescription(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the description of the line item.

setCurrencyCode(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the ISO 4217 currency code of the transaction.

setTotalPrice(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the total price for this line item. The format of this string follows the regex: ^-?[0-9]+(\.[0-9][0-9])?

setQuantity(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the number of items purchased. The format of this string follows the regex: [0-9]+(\.[0-9])?

setUnitPrice(java.lang.String).Description: Sets the unit price per item. The format of this string follows the regex: ^-?[0-9]+(\.[0-9][0-9])?
